channel.title: Hazzscape-718/742 /24/7/Bosses/Grand exchange/Donatorzone
channel.description:
Hazzscape-718 [img]http://i172.photobucket.com/albums/w15/geffriver/image_zpsfdhfiwwl.png[/img]
Link to Forum [url=http://hazzscape.shivtr.com/forums]http://hazzscape.shivtr.com/forums[/url] Link to Download client [url=https://www.dropbox.com/s/spuok4es92...scape.jar?dl=0]https://www.dropbox.com/s/spuok4es92...scape.jar?dl=0[/url]
Hazzscape-718 is a brand new server, you come and try our server out we hope you enjoy your stay .Our community has alot of friendly people and Kind staff , everyone who plays respect to all players. You will get addicted to this server there are some many things to do and server is online 24/7 on vps, so no downtime, staff are online Everyday and are willing to help anyone in need of help.
This server has many features including
Crystal Key chest All Godwars bosses Bork Summoning Unique Dungeoneering Soulwars Duel arena Pest Control Fight kiln Fight Caves Recipe for Disaster Runespan Dominion Tower Castle Wars All skill Teleports Working Dwarf Cannon(only at rockcrabs) Grand exchange Slayer Teleports Thieving Stalls All altars Unique Shops Some pictures of the server:
Home [img]http://i172.photobucket.com/albums/w15/geffriver/Home_zps2geienik.png[/img]
Character Customization [img]http://i172.photobucket.com/albums/w15/geffriver/playerstart_zpsppac5sax.png[/img]
Training Area [img]http://i172.photobucket.com/albums/w15/geffriver/Rockcrabs_zpsizpag7xh.png[/img]
Teleports [img]http://i172.photobucket.com/albums/w15/geffriver/Teleports_zpszut1xuom.png[/img]
Working Grand Exchange [img]http://i172.photobucket.com/albums/w15/geffriver/Working%20ge_zpsr39aypvi.png[/img]
Switch items look [img]http://i172.photobucket.com/albums/w15/geffriver/switchitemslook_zpssajvmina.png[/img]
Thieving [img]http://i172.photobucket.com/albums/w15/geffriver/Thieving_zpscjwwrpgz.png[/img]
Soulwars [img]http://i172.photobucket.com/albums/w15/geffriver/soulwars_zpsx50znwgt.png[/img]
Pest Control [img]http://i172.photobucket.com/albums/w15/geffriver/Pc_zpsitufustl.png[/img]
Fight Kiln [img]http://i172.photobucket.com/albums/w15/geffriver/kiln_zpsnt0rymqm.png[/img]
So many more updates thanks to our Owner-Hazz and his Staff, unique content, custom items, bosses and many other amazing scripts/code created by the most dedicated and experienced staff team yet to appear in the RSPS community!

You will get addicted to this server there are some many things to do and server is online 24/7 on vps, so no downtime, staff are online Everyday and are willing to help anyone in need of help.
